title: These Make-at-Home Shots Strengthen Your Immunity
description: Three fast and simple recipes using ingredients you may already have on hand.
cleaned_text: Food can be preventative medicine when you eat a diet packed with nutrients, vitamins, minerals and gut-friendly properties, such as probiotics. And certain ingredients have the potency to bolster your body's defenses against illness. "Garlic, ginger and turmeric, for example, have a long history of both supporting the immune system and reducing inflammation," says [Amanda Carney](https://www.the-well.com/editorial/well-qa-amanda-carney), certified health coach and Director of Health Coaching at THE WELL. "Of course food is the most powerful when it is combined with other healthy lifestyle habits — [getting adequate sleep](https://www.the-well.com/editorial/breathing-exercises-for-sleep), exercising and finding ways to mitigate stress," Carney adds. These wellness shots can supply an added dose of goodness during trying times: Garlic-Citrus-Turmeric Shot Ingredients: - 1-2 cloves of garlic, minced - 1 tbsp honey - 1/4 tsp turmeric - 1 tbsp hot water - 1 lemon, juiced - 1 navel orange, juiced - 1 tsp grated fresh ginger - Dash of cayenne pepper - Dash of sea salt - Grind of black pepper - 1 tbsp apple cider vinegar - Optional: add in a drizzle of coconut oil to gain full benefits of turmeric Directions: - Whisk together garlic, honey, turmeric and hot water until smooth. - Add the lemon and orange juice, ginger, cayenne pepper, sea salt, black pepper and apple cider vinegar. - Enjoy ASAP for maximum health benefits. If using a juicer, juice ingredients and enjoy! If using a blender, pulse until well blended. Then pour into a nut bag or cheesecloth and squeeze out moisture. - Enjoy ASAP for maximum health benefits. Citrus-Apple-Garlic-Ginger Shot Ingredients: - 1 orange, peeled - 1 lemon, peeled - 1 cup pineapple, diced - 1 apple, core removed and diced (leave skin on for maximum nutrition) - 1 clove garlic - 1/2-3/4 inch fresh ginger root - Dash of cayenne pepper (use to sprinkle over the juice, once made) Directions: - Place ingredients in either a juicer or blender. If using a juicer, juice ingredients and enjoy! If using a blender, pulse until well blended. Then pour into a nut bag or cheesecloth and squeeze out moisture. - Enjoy ASAP for maximum health benefits.
